summary:
Poisons Applied to Weapons now Last for 60 Hits, Default. Makes game More Medieval and RPG Like Being able to Apply Poisons to your Weapons and Having them Last for more than one Hit.

Game tested the 60 hits and 60 hits seems to be the magic number for a good lasting poison coated weapon.

Look under alchemy tree, required
descriptionHtml:
Poisons Applied to Weapons now Last for 60 Hits, Default. Makes game More Medieval and RPG Like Being able to Apply Poisons to your Weapons and Having them Last for more than one Hit.

Game tested the 60 hits and 60 hits seems to be the magic number for a good lasting poison coated weapon.

Look under alchemy tree, required Alchemy Skill '40', Look for Concentrated Poisons Talent abouve Effective Poisoner Perk. Put a Skill into it, and boom, poisons last for 60 hits apon applied to weapon.
author: sw33tsp0t
